name: Jewel Amazing Crush
description:
Description：
WELCOME TO THE MOST AMAZING&ADDICTIVE JEWEL PUZZLE ADVENTURE!!
Jewel Amazing Crush is one of the most attractive match-3 puzzle games.Slide your fingers to swap,match and crush jewels.We hope it can give you a day in a good mood!
FEATURES
● 500+ Addictive levels
-Brings you new and improved challenges
●FREE to play
-There are also daily free rewards and awesome bonus in game
●Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master
-Free to use some boosters everyday
●No time limit
-Don’t worry the time limits in level, you can play at any time and any place
●Frequent funny events
-Extra challenge and rewards for you
●Offline games
-Do not require Wi-Fi

What are you waiting for?
Download Now!
Join us and Enjoy this miraculous Jewel puzzle adventure!
